review: I purchased the fire stick and the fire tv, both are great products. The one thing I did not like is the limited selection. I watch Netflix mostly, I don't like how the selection is limited and I can not search for movies and tv shows like on the web site.  I tried the free sign up for prime because I saw a show that I thought I would like but not all the seasons were free to view, also some of the other series on prime are limited to one season, when I know their is more then one. Over all they are good products well made, presented well, easy set up, shipping time was shorter then I though and amazon kept you informed all the way thought it. I prefer the stick for the versatility.

review: You have to keep in mind that you will need to purchase a monthly package like, Amazon Prime, Hulu or Netflix Streaming. If you are into old TV Series and old movies this is great. You should also keep in mind that not all movies can be streamed (I was disappointed when I found this out). Bottom line the Fire TV streaming box works great and I like the voice command feature to search also!
